a.xlink:title: Xbee wireless communication client for embedded firmware applications.
Base class for Xbee API client applications.
Base class for Xbee API applications.
Abstract base class for pause and resume services.
Manages connection state, quality, and statistics for Xbee API clients.
Represents the connection state and handles state transitions.
Assesses connection quality and provides metrics for reliability.
Stores connection statistics and counters for diagnostics.
Stores signal strength and provides conversion to percent.
Tracks transmit period statistics and provides min/max/average values.
Counter for connection events with a maximum value.
Diagnostic counters for XBEE communication.
Handles Xbee modem status responses and event dispatching.
Spectrum Analyzer Service for Xbee API.
Base class for Xbee API services.
Service for managing DIGI XBEE module parameters.
Service for discovering devices in the Xbee network.
Channel scanning service for XBee modules.
Encapsulates FreeRTOS queue creation, management, and operations.
Base class for user-defined protocol processing.
